scripts.package-kiosk: @powershell Copy-Item package.json -Destination package.copy.json && package-json-merge package.copy.json src/applications/kiosk/package.json > package.json && @powershell Remove-Item package.copy.json
scripts.package-clipmaker: @powershell Copy-Item package.json -Destination package.copy.json && package-json-merge package.copy.json src/applications/clipmaker/package.json > package.json && @powershell Remove-Item package.copy.json
scripts.start0: rm -rf ./dist && mkdir ./dist && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config=./webpack/config.server.js --mode=production && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config=./webpack/config.client.js --mode=production
scripts.start1: rimraf dist && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge start
scripts.start11: @powershell -Command $env:APPLICATION='kiosk' && rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js --env build_mode=development && electron-forge start
scripts.start00: set description=selfiebox-kiosk&& set name=selfiebox-kiosk&& set APPLICATION=kiosk&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js --env build_mode=development && electron-forge start
scripts.starta: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && electron-forge start
scripts.astart: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js --env build_mode=development
scripts.start: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js --env build_mode=development && electron-forge start
scripts.package: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge package
scripts.make: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge make
scripts.publish: set DEFAULTPORT=8002&& set APPLICATION=clipmaker&& rimraf dist-front && webpack --config webpack.front.common.js && electron-forge publish
